title: 820-3437 u3900 no camera
message:
hi, Im seeing a few post saying to live with camera because it's too risky right ?
as an iphone technician who have tried repair ip6+ touch issue, ip 7 audio issue, i think u3900 should be easier compared to that right ? or not ?correct me if im wrong.
well anyway does anyone have a stencil for this chip

title: 820-3437 u3900 no camera
